attributes.action: ensure action is taken against the services who should have been there to protect 'baby p'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There were so many opportunities available to save the life of baby p, yet due to the failings of the individuals involved, these went unnoticed. 

This petition calls for the PM to ensure legal action is taken against the individuals of Haringey social services who had so many opportunities to prevent the death of baby p.

Despite several hospital visits, over 60 visits from social services (including one 4 days before his death) and the police being opposed to baby p returning home - social services still allowed his mother to have custody. 

Action needs to be taken to ensure that social services across the country who are trained to see such neglect,never allow this kind of tragedy happen again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
